post.body: Australia II: we learn Nicole is actually a robot designed by Japanese engineers to infiltrate and destroy Western pop culture.
Just type it. Oldschool. Or if you mouse over the msg you want to reply to, there's a little arrow to click on, on the right.
Like this.
merry Christmas snazzy delicious!!!! Xxxxxxxxx }{
I love you so much in this film. What perfect Christmas fare! #petersfriends
All my friends are Daleks. http://twitpic.com/wmp8
"You shall be Arthur's manservant." LOL.
Watching Merlin with peeps and thinking of @snazzydee. Also eating.
IF ONLY there was a way to get hold of the Dr Who Xmas Special without waiting for Auntie... ;P
Christmas at Taronga Park Zoo: http://tinyurl.com/9o4kqd
And now for my Traditional PostChristmas Breakfast. Fizzygoodmakefeelnice. Fzzzzz.
Must.stop.eating. But I have to have a chocolate to to with my port. And maybe one more mince pie...
Playing Balderdash with Mum and Dad.
I may never eat again. Although a turkey and stuffing sandwich could be fun... Or just one more mince pie...
Dog spent about 20 mins looking for her ball in Snake Gully. Eventually emerged with so many burrs she is now entirely green.
Eated. Napped. Eated again.
Reasons I love my Mum, #638: (handing me a parcel) 'This is your lol-present.'
The dog just woke me up. She clearly hasn't slept a wink and is desperate to open her presents.
Better go to sleep or Santa won't come...
Dear Lazyweb: How many 27x great grandfathers do I have? #ifailatmaths
